title: Navigating to a page with "await parent()" crashes the app
body:
### Describe the bug

After the 431 release, "await parent()" inside +page.server.ts has stopped working. Client-side navigating to a page with await parent() crashes with this error:

```
Cannot read properties of null (reading 'data')
TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'data')
    at parent (file:///home/projects/sveltejs-kit-template-default-qntcbd/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/server/index.js:303:41)
    at async load (/src/routes/subpage/+page.server.js:2:17)
```

This error is also in the latest release, 436.

Refreshing the page works, it only happens during client-side navigation. It happens both during dev and after a build.

### Reproduction

[Reproduction](https://stackblitz.com/edit/sveltejs-kit-template-default-qntcbd?file=src/routes/page/subpage/+page.server.js)

From the home page, click "Go to page" and then "Go to subpage" and it crashes. The /page/ has a +layout.server.js and the /page/subpage/ has a +page.server.js where it does an "await parent()".

### Logs

_No response_

### System Info

```shell
System:
    OS: Windows 10 10.0.22000
    CPU: (32) x64 AMD Ryzen 9 5950X 16-Core Processor
    Memory: 53.32 GB / 63.91 GB
  Binaries:
    Node: 16.16.0 - C:\Program Files\nodejs\node.EXE
    npm: 8.11.0 - C:\Program Files\nodejs\npm.CMD
  Browsers:
    Edge: Spartan (44.22000.120.0), Chromium (104.0.1293.63)
    Internet Explorer: 11.0.22000.120
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-auto: 1.0.0-next.66 => 1.0.0-next.66
    @sveltejs/kit: 1.0.0-next.436 => 1.0.0-next.436
    svelte: ^3.49.0 => 3.49.0
    vite: ^3.0.9 => 3.0.9
```


### Severity

blocking an upgrade

### Additional Information

_No response_
